pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OS2mo DAR ClientOS2mo DAR Client is a client for [DAWA / DAR](https://dawadocs.dataforsyningen.dk/).## RequirementsPython 3.8+Dependencies:* More Itertools* AIOHTTP* RA Utils## Installation```console$ pip install os2mo-dar-client```## Usage```Pythonfrom os2mo_dar_client import DARClientdarclient = DARClient()with darclient: print(darclient.healthcheck())```## LicenseThis project is licensed under the terms of the MPL-2.0 license.
